articles.author: HT Sports Desk
articles.title: Virat Kohli called 'legendary' by UFC legend Conor McGregor, Real Madrid star Vinicius Jr after India win T20 WC title - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Virat Kohli played a match-winning knock as India defeated South Africa in the T20 World Cup final. | Crickit
articles.content: Virat Kohli was at his best form on Saturday, as India ended their ICC trophy drought, defeating South Africa in the T20 World Cup final in Bridgetown. Having been in poor form throughout the tournam… [+2467 chars]
